message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you halfway between our prices, so I'll offer it to you for $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9800?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $10000. That's as low as I can go.
